title: cyclecare.in â€“ Bicycle Service Booking Platform
shortDescription: Built a freelance full-stack service booking platform enabling doorstep bicycle servicing for electric, geared, and non-geared cycles. Implemented slot-based bookings using Next.js and Google Apps Script, integrated with Google Workspace tools for operations. Deployed on Vercel with a lightweight, cost-effective backend optimized for small-business scalability.
